scripts.verify:state: pnpm verify:urls && pnpm verify:listings && pnpm test:e2e:no-server
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --filter database migrate:deploy
scripts.db:seed: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --filter database db:seed
scripts.db:studio: pnpm exec dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --filter database studio
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm test:setup && pnpm --filter web test:e2e:install-browsers && pnpm --filter web test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:no-server: pnpm test:setup && pnpm --filter web test:e2e:install-browsers && pnpm --filter web test:e2e:no-server
